name: Virtual University of Pakistan
description: The Virtual University of Pakistan (VU) creates its own content in the form of video lectures and associated handouts. The content, including over 6000 hours of video lectures,  has been made freely available through the University's OpenCourseWare site (http://ocw.vu.edu.pk)  which includes the video lectures, assignments and solutions, and, where applicable, course notes and handouts. The courses offered are complete 3 credit courses as used by the Virtual University of Pakistan itself.
